    • Method Detail

      • addRecipe

        public java.lang.String addRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Adds a recipe to the Recipe collection in db and any ingredients not already in Recipe Ingredients. This method will set the Recipe id to the corresponding document id in the collection
        Parameters:
        recipe - A Recipe object we want to add to the collection of Recipes and whose id we want to set
        Returns:
        Returns the id of the Recipe document
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If any transaction in the method was not complete

      • delRecipe

        public void delRecipe​(java.lang.String id)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Deletes a recipe document with the id from the collection of recipes
        Parameters:
        id - The id of recipe document we want to delete
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete

      • editRecipe

        public void editRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Updates the corresponding recipe document in the collection with the fields of the recipe object.
        Parameters:
        recipe - A Recipe object whose changes we want to push to the collection of Recipes
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete

      • getRecipe

        public Recipe getRecipe​(java.lang.String id)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        id - A String with the id of the document who recipe we want
        Returns:
        The Recipe object that corresponds to the document in the collection If it does not exist then return null
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete

      • getRecipes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> getRecipes()
                                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Makes an ArrayList of Recipes out of all the documents in the collection of Recipes
        Returns:
        ArrayList The List of all Recipes contained in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete
